name: Millennium  Cervical Chair Hydraulic
descr:
Chiroform has developed a first class serie of treatment- and examination equipment in co-operation with doctors, designer teams, engineers and the industry. The Chiroform Millennium equipment wears the global patent and trademark, and focus on both the patient and practitioner. New perspectives and options will open up with the Chiroform Millennium equipment.

The Chiroform Millennium Cervical Chair. The unique anatomical and ergonomically shape makes the examination and treatment excellent. The new dimensions and the 3-dimensional seat and backrest provides ultimate support and rest for the patient. The new oval design allows optimum access for the practitioner. The superior fitting allows simple and immediately operation of the backrest, whithout inconvenience for both the patient and practitioner. The chair is operated via an easy touchpad mounted into the backrest fitting. This chair is height adjusted via the known hydraulic foot pump.

Available in other fabrics and colours by request.

5 years of warranty on the frame. Upholstery 1 year of warranty.
